name: Alpha I
description: A desolate sector home to the blue star Alpha I. This sector has no native life due to the immense heat radiating from the star.

name: Alpha II
description: A sector full of life with 3 habitable planets, however none of the lifeforms on the planets are capable of space travel.

name: Alpha III
description: This sector has many mineral-rich planets with 2 of them hosting intelligent life.

name: Beta I
description: Only one planet remains in this sector, it used to be a prosperous home to an insectoid species however war has greatly ravaged their homeworld.

name: Beta II
description: Although no life is present there are plenty of planets and a few of them still have useful resources such as gold and iron.

name: Gamma I
description: Not much is to be found here, the only planet that remains has already been depleted of most of its resources.

name: Delta I
description: A single star is all that can be found in this sector. There is no reason to visit this sector unless your hobbies consist of flying into a sun.

name: Delta II
description: The economic and technological center of this solar system, home to a hyper-developed cybernetic race who know only of profit.

name: Delta III
description: Many planets, though none habitable, can be found in this sector. A good source of rarer minerals such as uranium and plutonium.

name: Delta IV
description: The native populi within this sector have begun to expand rapidly, although primitive the inhabitants of this sector are willing to trade.

name: Epsilon I
description: The sun within this sector has absorbed copious amounts of radioactive material resulting in it's ghastly green glow. Stay away from this sector.
